name: Walkerman Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The original soundtrack to Walkerman, produced by Walker Peterson. All files are available in high-quality .flac format. This soundtrack will be updated with all new tracks as future acts are released.

Track Listing:
1. Raiders (Main Theme)
2. Pine Boughs
3. Morning
4. Secrets
5. Downwards
6. Macaw Girl
7. Alchemy
8. Sacred
9. Serfkind
10. Downbend
11. Wreck and Ruin
12. Hoot and Holler
13. Herdchaser-girl
14. The Slippery Slope
15. Loss
16. Alleyways
17. Going Around
18. Night Moves
19. Damn You!
20. Vereor Nox
21. The Lurking Fear
22. Swallow the Fear
23. Walkerman

NOTE: Soundtrack purchases go to our musician, not ScalemaiL.

short_description: The soundtrack to Walkerman, a visual novel by ScalemaiL.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Any 64 Bit Procesor
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Ubuntu/SteamOS
  • Processor: Any 64 Bit Processor
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
